metadata.dc:author: Ruiz-Rico Ruiz, R
González Méndez, M V
Sainz Quevedo, M
metadata.dc:description: Eight-seven patients with severe tinnitus were studied. All patients underwent a complete audiological examination and tinnitus evaluation (pitch-matching, loudness, post-masking effect, masking curves, etc.). Most of the patients with a positive residual inhibition test had Feldman type I and III masking curves.
metadata.dc:title: Enmascaradores acústicos y curvas de Feldman en acúfenos. Estudio clínico.
[Acoustic masking and Feldmann curves in tinnitus. Clinical study].
